Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with LRRK2 variants (p.G2019S and p.R1441C).

Readout description.Result Description: Increased phosphorylation of Î±-synuclein in p.G2019S-expressing cells compared to wild-type.
Reduced kinase activity in p.R1441C-expressing cells compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Phosphorylation levels deviating by more than 20% from wild-type.

Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells were treated with LRRK2 variants (p.G2019S and p.R1441C).

Readout description.Result Description: Significant increase in cell death (30% reduction in viability) for p.G2019S compared to wild-type.
Moderate increase in cell death (15% reduction in viability) for p.R1441C compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: No positive control was explicitly mentioned.

Basic negative control.Description: Untreated cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Material used.Description: Mouse dopaminergic neurons were transfected with LRRK2 variants (p.G2019S and p.R1441C).

Readout description.Result Description: Altered localization of LRRK2 to lysosomes in p.G2019S-expressing neurons compared to wild-type.
Reduced LRRK2 localization to mitochondria in p.R1441C-expressing neurons compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was imaged in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: No positive control was explicitly mentioned.

Basic negative control.Description: Untreated neurons were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Chi-square test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: LRRK2 localization to lysosomes or mitochondria within 10% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: LRRK2 localization deviating by more than 20% from wild-type.
